original_title: 毛沢東--その生涯と文化大革命--
overview: Nagisa Oshima's documentary details the rise of Chairman Mao during the revolution and shows the Communist Party's struggle and cultural upheaval. Made in 1969 for NTV station, this TV documentary also questions Mao's dictator tendency during the cultural revolution.
title: Mao Tse-Tung and the Cultural Revolution
